transcript.text: Were you aware that there are special rules when giving and receiving business gifts and entertainment? Not following these rules could make it seem like we are trying to buy business, or are open to being influenced in our decision making.

panelText.text: Giving and receiving gifts requires good judgment and an understanding of our company guidelines and the law.

Business gifts and entertainment are an important part of building relationships with our clients, suppliers and business partners. But we have to be careful. It must never look like we are trying to buy business or can be influenced by the gifts or entertainment we receive.

Your choices in this area reflect on Johnson Controls, so always use good judgment and follow our guidelines for business gifts and entertainment, and the special rules that apply when dealing with government officials.
